name: STAX - A Better Way to Play & Teach
blurb: A project worth funding for the fun of playing, STAX is also set to introduce a revolutionary system for education and advertisement

rewards.reward: * ALL BACKERS will be given early access for alpha & beta testing phases of STAX if they want it, and ALL BACKERS will be invited to the launch event if it actually happens.  Drinks and food will be 'on us'\r\n   -----    Backers have to pledge at the next ($13) level to receive these rewards; $1 was listed as a placeholder to get this message at the top of the reward list!

You'll get STAX for Android or iOS when it's ready, reserve and lock your username for ALL versions (even versions you haven't installed), and get an exclusive 'STAX Backer' rubber wristband.\r\n\r\nWe're targeting late-March / early-April for the Android & iOS versions of STAX, but your username and wristband rewards will be in motion as soon as the project closes so we're using those two as the basis for 'estimated delivery'.
A full deck of STAX Education Version cards will be donated in your name (courtesy of you) to an elementary school (K-5) classroom of your choosing anywhere in the continental United States.

You'll get the $13 package plus a stylish "I KickStarted STAX" T-shirt.  Adult sizes S - XXL, white or black.\r\n\r\nSame deal with delivery - everything but the app will be in motion after the project closes.

You'll get the bracelet, t-shirt, the game on release-date, username lock (in other words, the $40 package) plus a premium kickstarter-backer-exclusive physical deck of STAX cards (deck of 36 cards allowing up to a 6 x 6 grid).  These will be printed ONCE with a unique set of symbols and a unique back-side that will never be made again.  To further boost the collectible value, we're setting a limit of 6,000 decks; 5,000 at this level and another 1,000 split among some of the higher levels.  If this game grows as we believe it can, you'll find yourself one of only 6,000 people in the world to own a true 'first edition'.\r\n\r\nFuture print runs will be in quantities of no-less than 25,000 decks.

7" Android Tablet pre-loaded with STAX and your locked username in addition to the T-shirt & wristband.  We're not sure what version of Android will be current at the time of shipping, but rest assured you'll have it on your tablet.  It's worth pointing out that the higher number of backers who select this reward, the better brand of tablet we can offer (based on a volume-purchase).\r\n\r\nUPDATE: If we meet our goal, I'll rush ship these to target pre-christmas as the delivery date.  Those selecting this option won't have the completed version of STAX on their tablet in December, but they will still get it as soon as it's ready.  We won't have our kickstarter funds at that point, so I'll be purchasing the tablets on my own dime to bring you this offer!!!

The $205 package plus a name of your choosing (full name, username, other...keep it clean please) in a "Special Thanks" section of STAX' credits...and we'll roll them slow enough that names can actually be read!  Launch party tickets now included.

This package gives you key upgrades to the $300 pledge.  Backers at this level will get the bracelet & T-Shirt.  You'll receive an iPad Mini, and it will have the STAX logo and a short message of your choosing brush-engraved into the back.  Via that iPad Mini, you'll be invited (but not required) to participate in our pre-launch test/debug/optimization efforts including humanized difficulty verification (of the level assigned by our logic engine).  If you're exceptionally smart, this means you could skew the very median difficulty higher than it otherwise would have been!  Those choosing to participate in test/debug/optimization will have direct email and telephone communication with our development team.

Oh, did I forget to mention that you'll also be extended an invitation to attend our launch party with a guest?  Free drinks & h'ordeuvres, a "goodie bag", and a dev-team ready to blow off 6 months of time-pressure ought to make it an event to remember.

The first 500 backers at this level will get a deck of "first-run" STAX cards as well (but we're not limiting this pledge to 500 so get in early)

The 'Angel' package adds (to the $850 package)an artist-carved marble STAX desk-top statue, custom-designed exclusively for each individual Kickstarter backer (at this level) by OmniHanded Interactive's President.  You'll also get executive producer credits in every version/expansion of STAX released from January 1st, 2013 through March 31st, 2014 and an office pass to visit us freely during and after development.\r\n\r\nFirst-run card sets for the first 500 backers at this level.
